# Paths allowed on main (release branch view)
.github/workflows/ci.yml
.github/workflows/release-files-only.yml
.github/workflows/bot-clean-main.yml
.github/release-allowlist.txt
.gitignore
README.md
LICENSE
LICENSE.*
CHANGELOG.md
RELEASE_NOTES.md
dist/**
docs/wiki/**
scripts/publish_wiki.sh
scripts/list_disallowed_release_files.sh
scripts/cleanup_main_release_tree.sh
bin/v11_stage0
bin/v11_stage1
